column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Uncle , you 're the only person other than the Avatar who can possibly defeat the Father Lord . "
#Text=Toph says : " You mean the Fire Lord . "
#Text=Zuko says : " That 's what I just said ! "
#Text=Iroh says : " Hmmm ... " Zuko says : " We need you to come with us ! "
#Text=Iroh says : " No , Zuko , it wo n't turn out well . "
#Text=Zuko says : " You can beat him !
#Text=History would see it as just more senseless violence , a brother killing a brother to grab power .
#Text=The only way for this war to end peacefully is for the Avatar to defeat the Fire Lord .
#Text=" Zuko says : " And then ... then you would come and take your rightful place on the throne ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " No .
#Text=Someone new must take the throne .
#Text=An idealist with a pure heart and unquestionable honor .
#Text=It has to be you , Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Unquestionable honor ?
#Text=But I 've made so many mistakes .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes , you have .
#Text=You 've struggled ; you 've suffered , but you have always followed your own path .
#Text=You restored your own honor , and only you can restore the honor of the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'll try , Uncle .
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , what if Aang does n't come back ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Sozin 's Comet is arriving , and our destinies are upon us .
#Text=Aang will face the Fire Lord .
#Text=When I was a boy , I had a vision that I would one day take Ba Sing Se .
#Text=Only now do I see that my destiny is to take it back from the Fire Nation , so the Earth Kingdom can be free again .
#Text=" Suki says : " That 's why you gathered the members of the White Lotus .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes .
#Text=Zuko , you must return to the Fire Nation , so that when the Fire Lord falls , you can assume the throne and restore peace and order .
#Text=But Azula will be there , waiting for you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I can handle Azula .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Not alone !
#Text=You 'll need help .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're right .
#Text=Katara , how would you like to help me put Azula in her place ?
#Text=" Katara says : " It would be my pleasure .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What about us ?
#Text=What is our destiny today ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " What do you think it is ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think that , even though we do n't know where Aang is , we need to do everything we can to stop the airship fleet .
#Text=" Toph says : " And that means when Aang does face the Fire Lord , we 'll be right there if he needs us .
#Text="
